iti109:2.1_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso nadiyā sotena ovuyheyya piyarūpasātarūpena.
iti109:2.2_0: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso tīre ṭhito disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
iti109:2.3_3: atthi cettha heṭṭhā rahado saūmi sāvaṭṭo sagaho sarakkhaso yaṁ tvaṁ,
iti109:2.3_5: rahadaṁ pāpuṇitvā maraṇaṁ vā nigacchasi maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhan’ti.
iti109:2.4_2: puriso tassa purisassa saddaṁ sutvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca paṭisotaṁ vāyameyya.
iti109:3.1_0: Upamā kho me ayaṁ, bhikkhave, katā atthassa viññāpanāya.
iti109:4.1_0: ‘Piyarūpaṁ sātarūpan’ti kho, bhikkhave, channetaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ āyatanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
iti109:5.1_0: ‘Heṭṭhā rahado’ti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
iti109:10.1_0: ‘Hatthehi ca pādehi ca vāyāmo’ti kho, bhikkhave, vīriyārambhassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
iti109:13.1_0: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
